title: Tanky Annie
body:
{{item:3029}} {{item:3152}} {{item:3116}} {{item:3151}} is what I saw on an Annie that made her tanky and they did a lot of damage. Granted this is on ARAM, but would anyone care to explain to me why health alone makes a champ tanky without any resistances? And their runes were built towards comet and the secondary wasn't towards tank either. So ruins only played a part in giving her more damage, but nothing towards making her tanky.

This is the same problem that I have with {{item:3083}} , why can a champ get tanky with health alone and no resistances built?

replies.body: Annie E makes health go farther for her than most.
